# PIC Device Memory Specifications
# Format: DEVICE_NAME, PROGRAM_MEMORY_WORDS, DATA_MEMORY_BYTES, EEPROM_BYTES, ARCHITECTURE
#
# Program memory is specified in WORDS (14-bit for PIC16, 16-bit for PIC18)
# The assembler will convert words to bytes (words * 2)
#
# Sources: Microchip datasheets and device summaries
# Architecture: PIC12, PIC16, or PIC18

# PIC10/12 Family (12-bit core)
PIC10F200, 256, 16, 0, PIC12
PIC10F202, 512, 24, 0, PIC12
PIC10F204, 256, 16, 0, PIC12
PIC10F206, 512, 24, 0, PIC12
PIC10F220, 256, 16, 0, PIC12
PIC10F222, 512, 24, 0, PIC12
PIC10F320, 256, 64, 0, PIC12
PIC10F322, 512, 64, 0, PIC12

# PIC12 Family (14-bit core)
PIC12F508, 512, 25, 0, PIC12
PIC12F509, 1024, 41, 0, PIC12
PIC12F510, 512, 25, 0, PIC12
PIC12F519, 1024, 41, 0, PIC12
PIC12F609, 1024, 64, 0, PIC12
PIC12F615, 1024, 64, 128, PIC12
PIC12F617, 2048, 128, 128, PIC12
PIC12F629, 1024, 64, 128, PIC12
PIC12F635, 1024, 64, 128, PIC12
PIC12F675, 1024, 64, 128, PIC12
PIC12F683, 2048, 128, 256, PIC12
PIC12F752, 2048, 128, 0, PIC12
PIC12F1501, 1024, 64, 0, PIC12
PIC12F1571, 1024, 64, 0, PIC12
PIC12F1572, 2048, 128, 0, PIC12
PIC12F1612, 2048, 128, 0, PIC12
PIC12F1822, 2048, 128, 256, PIC12
PIC12F1840, 4096, 256, 256, PIC12
